dict.acceptation: 英雄，勇士；男主角；（古代神话中的）神人，半神的勇士；

sent.orig: Whenever we encountered a HERO tank there was always one or two nearby providing support.
sent.trans: 无论何时我们遭遇到HERO战队的坦克，总有另外一至两辆坦克在侧翼进行火力支援。

sent.orig: Perform a hero living, li Ling guides examine, perform a hero gone.
sent.trans: 演主人公活著，李领导审查，就演主人公死去。

sent.orig: On Hero and Hero-workship is a well-known book written by Thomas Carlyle.
sent.trans: 《论英雄与英雄崇拜》这一名著的作者为托马斯卡莱尔。

sent.orig: As described above, team leaders cannot choose their own hero until all AI have hero.
sent.trans: 如上所述，小组队长（常是玩家）所有ai都拥有英雄后，才可选择自己的英雄。

sent.orig: A man must be a hero to understand a hero.
